channel.title: Demos on Jenkins X
channel.description: Recent content in Demos on Jenkins X

item.title: Articles
item.description: Jenkins X — TLS enabled Previews by Steve Boardwell, June 26th, 2019 Jenkins X — Securing the Cluster by Steve Boardwell, June 22nd, 2019 Upgrading Ingress Rules And Adding TLS Certificates With Jenkins X by Viktor Farcic, May 31th, 2019 The Evolution Of Jenkins Jobs And How We Got To The YAML-Based jenkins-x.yml Format by Viktor Farcic, May 9th, 2019 Implementing ChatOps With Jenkins X by Viktor Farcic, April 24th, 2019 Going Serverless With Jenkins X: Exploring Prow, Jenkins X Pipeline Operator, And Tekton by Viktor Farcic, April 15th, 2019 Working With Pull Requests And Preview Environments by Viktor Farcic, March 25th, 2019 Improving And Simplifying Software Development With Jenkins X by Viktor Farcic, March 10th, 2019 Exploring Jenkins X: DevPods on March 6th, 2019 by Nicolas DeLoof Setting up Jenkins X on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) on March 6th, 2019 by Pui Chee Chan Progressive Delivery with Jenkins X: Automatic Canary Deployments on March 5th, 2019 by Carlos Sanchez Jenkins X Environment Specific Variables on March 4th, 2019 by Nicholas Duffy Creating Custom Jenkins X Build Packs by Viktor Farcic, February 27th, 2019 Is Your Cluster Ready For Jenkins X?

item.title: Talks and Conferences
item.description: 2019-07-04 Modern CI/CD with Tekton and Prow Automated via Jenkins X at KubeCon (Barcelona) by Christie Wilson and James Rawlings 2019-07-04 Jenkins-X - CI/CD für die Kloud (German) at Java Forum Stuttgart (Germany) by Gerd Aschemann 2019-06-24 Serverless Jenkins on Kubernetes - Jenkins X at KubeCon CloudNativeCon 2019 (China) by RunZe Xia 2019-06-24/25/26 GitOps by courtesy of Jenkins-X at Container Days, Hamburg (Germany) by Gerd Aschemann

item.title: Create Cluster
item.description: This demo creates a new kubernetes cluster using these commands in parallel: jx create cluster gke jx create cluster aks jx create cluster minikube

item.title: Create Cluster GKE
item.description: This demo uses the jx create cluster gke command to create a new kubernetes cluster:

item.title: Create Spring
item.description: This demo uses the jx create spring command to create a new Spring Boot application with CI / CD pipelines with GitOps promotions:

item.title: Docker Image CVE Scanning
item.description: There is a blog on Announcing CVE docker image analysis with Anchore You can watch the video here

item.title: KubeCon 2018 Demo
item.description: Here is the video of a talk by James Strachan: Jenkins X: Easy CI/CD for Kubernetes at KubeCon Europe 2018. You can also get the slides from this talk here

item.title: DevOxx UK 2018 Demo
item.description: Here is the video of a talk by James Strachan: Jenkins X: Continuous Delivery for Kubernetes at DevOxx UK, 2018. You can also get the slides from this talk here
